original_solution_mapping.L1: After 30 days, there will be enough food left to sustain 300 people for 90 days - 30 days = 60 days.
original_solution_mapping.L2: After the 100 people leave, there will be 300-100 = <<300-100=200>>200 people left.
original_solution_mapping.L3: The 200 people will eat 200/300 = 2/3 as much food as the original group of people in the castle.
original_solution_mapping.L4: The 60 days' worth of food will last this smaller group for 60 days / (2/3) = <<60/(2/3)=90>>90 more days.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 315.
    Returns: the number of additional days until all the food runs out.
    """
    # L1
    initial_people = 300 # 300 people
    initial_days = 90 # 90 days
    days_passed = 30 # After 30 days
    remaining_days_for_initial_people = initial_days - days_passed

    # L2
    people_leaving = 100 # 100 people leave
    remaining_people = initial_people - people_leaving

    # L3
    consumption_ratio = Fraction(remaining_people, initial_people)

    # L4
    days_food_will_last = remaining_days_for_initial_people / consumption_ratio

    # FA
    answer = days_food_will_last
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After {days_passed} days, there will be enough food left to sustain {initial_people} people for {initial_days} days - {days_passed} days = {remaining_days_for_initial_people} days.
After the {people_leaving} people leave, there will be {initial_people}-{people_leaving} = <<{initial_people}-{people_leaving}={remaining_people}>>{remaining_people} people left.
The {remaining_people} people will eat {remaining_people}/{initial_people} = {consumption_ratio} as much food as the original group of people in the castle.

The {remaining_days_for_initial_people} days' worth of food will last this smaller group for {remaining_days_for_initial_people} days / ({consumption_ratio}) = <<{remaining_days_for_initial_people}/({consumption_ratio})={days_food_will_last}>>{days_food_will_last} more days.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: After 30 days, there will be enough food left to sustain 300 people for 90 days - 30 days = 60 days.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: After the 100 people leave, there will be 300-100 = <<300-100=200>>200 people left.

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'remaining_people' (value: 200) was reported instead of 'days_food_will_last' (value: 90).
